title: Riddle of We at the Heartwood Tree
description: "Sometimes it's hard being me."On their treasure quest Bliss, Faith, Will and Bond face the forces of nature and an even worse foe-Chaos, who whips up trouble wherever she goes. The kids find help from a lovable bunch of mysterious Synergy Pals, and wise guides, who set them on the right path. Once they discover the map to the heartwood tree, it proves to be an even great treasure then any of them could ever imagine.
author: Ardys Reverman
